channel.title: Urgent EASY to answer question , yes or no answer
channel.description: i always download servers, aka test scape, freescape, KarmaScape, but when ever i log in, no1 is online, are all servers private?? and if u can be bothered to answer, how do i get people to join it if they are private?

item.title: Urgent EASY to answer question , yes or no answer
item.dc:creator: @1_dum_taco 1 dum taco
item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

For one thing no one knows ur p addres…second of all go open a port to 43594 and then set up no-ip and make an ip and advertise it…

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent EASY to answer question , yes or no answer
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“chipmunk man, post:2, topic:63161”]PLease do not ask this, if you want to learn more on how to make server look at the link in my signature.
[size=15pt]This Topic Will Be Locked![/size]
Reason:
[glow=red,2,300]IT just will by a mod >__>[/glow][/quote] Please do not use these anoying things to say that it should be locked as you are just spamming. they might cant get on your server because they might need hamachi or you havnt told them your port number.
